name: Troll of the Dice
description:
Troll of the Dice is a wave based arena shooter where you must destroy dice, with a die,  in order to earn points.  This die will roll itself, determining how many bullets you can shoot, and how long you can move for.

WASD to move, click to shoot, escape to pause. You must shoot all your bullets and use all your move time before the die will reload.

Made by BenBonk and Gizmote for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme - "Roll of the Dice"
